#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int binarysearch(int A[],int r,int key,int l)
{
    while (r - l > 1)
    {
        int m = l + (r - l)/2;
        if (A[m]>=key)
            l = m;
        else
            r = m;
    }
    return r;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)                                // 8 3 3 1 3 45 52 34 34 223
    {                                         //  t =0; r[i]
                                                  //length =1;
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int ar[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>ar[i];
        int r[n],t[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        t[0]=ar[0];
        int length=1;
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(ar[i]<t[length-1]){t[length]=ar[i];length++;}
            else if(ar[i]>t[0]){t[0]=ar[i];}
            else
                { int k=binarysearch(t,length-1,ar[i],-1);
                   t[k]=ar[i];
                }


             }
cout<<length<<"\n";
//for(int i=0;i<length;i++)
  //  cout<<t[i];
    }
return 0;

}
